ResearchProjectDef.label: Primary Craftsmanship
ResearchProjectDef.description: You're not in stone age! Sit down and try to remember basics of your life before this catastrophe. Unlocks basic kitchen and production workbenches, some primal lightning and storages.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Medical care
ResearchProjectDef.description: New means to set up your medical area medieval style.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Pemmican
ResearchProjectDef.description: Make pemmican, a preserved mixture of meat and plant matter that doesn't go bad for a long time. Great for traveling.

ResearchProjectDef.label: psychoid brewing
ResearchProjectDef.description: With preparation, psychoid leaves can be boiled in water, producing a mildly euphoric and addictive tea.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Coldstone battery
ResearchProjectDef.description: Build an efficient passive cooling unit fueled coldstones.

ResearchProjectDef.label: passive cooler
ResearchProjectDef.description: Make passive coolers, to cool indoor spaces without using electricity.
